title: Thanks, but...
body: Firstly, let me say that I'm grateful that Riot sometimes randomly gifts stuff to us summoners: I think it's very generous of them. But I really don't appreciate that I was gifted a champion I don't want. I only play aram, and I've succeeded in only buying champions so far that I enjoy playing in that format, because the randomness and possibility of getting a free-week champ is stressful enough without owning champs I don't like playing. I was gifted Kayle yesterday, and now I'm probably going to roll her a ton. Since she was a gift, she's non-refundable, but I don't want her. Is there a way to have this reversed?

replies.body:
Hey there,

As you're unable to use a refund token for this content you'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), as they're the only ones who can assist with account specific inquiries.
